name: Heavy Loader
description:
you  are controlling a rocket which have to collect cargo but it also increases the weight of it which lead to less amount of thrust and speed , and your rocket will crash

its your decision to survive or collect cargo

keyboard controls only

A D, to move right and left

space to thrust the rocket up

Q   to drop cargo

Challenge your family and friends to reach as high as possible and collect as  much as cargo as possible!

made with darshil Bharucha enjoy and play!
